textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Established in Europe in 2000, designer Patrick Ithier's Ash is sophisticated and chic. Always keeping with classic, European design, Ash flirts with the boundary between refined elegance and on-trend precision. Well-designed and well-made, Ash shoes are like a Chanel suit: they'll remain a wardrobe staple for years.
